prompt_examples.prompt: Create a 100x50mm rectangular plate that's 5mm thick
prompt_examples.description: Simple rectangular extrusion with specified dimensions

prompt_examples.prompt: Make a cube that's 25mm on all sides
prompt_examples.description: Basic cube creation with equal dimensions

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a cylinder 20mm diameter and 30mm tall
prompt_examples.description: Cylindrical extrusion from circle sketch

prompt_examples.prompt: Add a 6mm hole in the center of this face
prompt_examples.description: Simple hole feature with diameter specification

prompt_examples.prompt: Create 4 corner holes, 8mm diameter, 10mm from edges
prompt_examples.description: Multiple holes with pattern and positioning constraints

prompt_examples.prompt: Make a countersunk hole 6mm diameter with 12mm countersink
prompt_examples.description: Specialized hole type with countersink parameters

prompt_examples.prompt: Fillet all edges with 3mm radius
prompt_examples.description: Apply fillet to multiple edges with specified radius

prompt_examples.prompt: Chamfer the top edges by 2mm at 45 degrees
prompt_examples.description: Chamfer specific edges with distance and angle

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a linear pattern of 5 holes spaced 20mm apart along the X-axis
prompt_examples.description: Linear pattern with count and spacing parameters

prompt_examples.prompt: Make a circular pattern of 8 holes around the center, 40mm radius
prompt_examples.description: Circular pattern with count and radius parameters

prompt_examples.prompt: Shell this part with 2mm wall thickness, remove the top face
prompt_examples.description: Shell operation with thickness and face removal

prompt_examples.prompt: Mirror this feature across the YZ plane
prompt_examples.description: Mirror feature across specified plane

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a construction plane 25mm offset from the XY plane
prompt_examples.description: Construction geometry for advanced modeling

prompt_examples.prompt: Make the top-left hole 2mm larger in diameter
prompt_examples.description: Modify existing feature dimensions
prompt_examples.clarification_needed: Which hole is the 'top-left' hole? Please select the hole or provide coordinates.

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a hexagonal prism 30mm across flats, 15mm tall
prompt_examples.description: Polygon-based extrusion with specific geometry

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a new component for the mounting bracket
prompt_examples.description: Component creation for assembly modeling

prompt_examples.prompt: Change document units to inches and scale this part by 1.5x
prompt_examples.description: Unit conversion and scaling operations

prompt_examples.prompt: Revolve this profile 270 degrees around the Y-axis
prompt_examples.description: Revolve operation with partial rotation

prompt_examples.prompt: Make it bigger
prompt_examples.description: Intentionally vague request requiring clarification
prompt_examples.clarification_needed: What would you like to make bigger? Please specify the feature and by how much (e.g., 'make the hole 2mm larger' or 'increase the plate length by 10mm').

prompt_examples.prompt: Create a mounting plate: 80x60x8mm with 4 corner holes (6mm) and a center cutout (20x30mm)
prompt_examples.description: Complex multi-step operation combining multiple features

Basic Shapes.description: Simple geometric primitives like rectangles, circles, and basic extrusions

Holes & Features.description: Various types of holes, cuts, and feature additions

Edge Modifications.description: Fillets, chamfers, and other edge treatments

Patterns.description: Linear and circular patterns of features

Advanced Operations.description: Complex operations like shell, mirror, and advanced modifications

Complex Operations.description: Advanced CAD operations like revolve, sweep, loft

Ambiguous Requests.description: Intentionally vague prompts that require clarification

Multi-step Operations.description: Complex requests requiring multiple coordinated operations

beginner.description: Simple, single-operation commands with clear parameters
beginner.expected_user: New to CAD or natural language CAD tools

intermediate.description: Multi-step operations or operations requiring some CAD knowledge
intermediate.expected_user: Some CAD experience, comfortable with basic operations

advanced.description: Complex operations, feature modifications, or assembly work
advanced.expected_user: Experienced CAD users looking for efficiency gains

usage_notes.testing: These examples are designed for comprehensive testing of the Co-Pilot system
usage_notes.training: Can be used to train users on natural language CAD capabilities
usage_notes.validation: Each example should produce a valid, executable plan
usage_notes.ambiguity_handling: Some examples intentionally test ambiguity resolution
usage_notes.selection_context: Examples marked 'requires_selection' assume user has pre-selected geometry
